name: Kids New Halloween Hair Salon game for hair style makeover
name_original: Kids New Halloween Hair Salon game for hair style makeover
description:
Kids Celebrate halloween with best friends :

Here Hair salon halloween many features,

* Cut its Hair
* Dry its hair
* Hair oil to make its hair grow
* Make a Curly hair
* You can also Straitning hair
* Make a colorful hair with given 15+ hair shades


Benefits / Features:
* 1000's of different combinations/looks possible.
* Post your halloween's new look on Facebook ,twitter and Email to your friends.
* Save the final look in your photo album.
